sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description/> <name>Fix null marked_for_deletion</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('ais_search_profile_ais_dictionary_m2m'); gr.addQuery('marked_for_deletion', null); gr.query(); while (gr.next()) { gr.setValue('marked_for_deletion', false); gr.update(); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-09-30 22:18:11</sys_created_on> <sys_id>433af92bc8bab010f8770f55d7bbd36b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Fix null marked_for_deletion</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="AI Search" source="com.glide.ais">eb04fc283c31311068bcf327dfe37f93</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_433af92bc8bab010f8770f55d7bbd36b</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>maint</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-09-30 22:18:11</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
